subject: Someone's suggestion . . .
author: judy_in_hollywood
full_text: Hi All, Someone suggested that one of us here, write an essay on the Modified RS 12-469 Am/FM digital radio and how it can be used like a Frank's box, then email the essay to Jeff Rense (Rense.com) to see if he'll post it.  Anyways, it's an idea from someone.   =Judy=
